WILL VLC player play this one

@cheekychappy.

The ISO file contains the .m2ts file. As it say's in the description:
The movie file itself will be located in the BDMV/STREAM folder, and will be named "00000.m2ts"
VLC will play this. On Mac just right click "show contents", on Windoze...don't know, you'll have to figure out how to open the ISO.

Keep up the excellent work! Congrats!!!!

if you ever have problems with skipping frames in fullhd, then disable underclocking in windows 7(just google it) and try all these players: Media Player Classic, SMplayer(this remembers playback position), VLC.
